overview:
Norberto enjoys working at the intersection between technology and consumer behavior. His interest in the mobile space started in 2001, with his Master Thesis on Tech Speed in the mobile industry, back when smartphones were not yet very smart. Now that they are, he is fascinated by the world of opportunity that lies ahead for Clever Sense. He co-founded and served as the CEO of a web platform for mass-customization and personalization at MojaMix, which was later acquired by private investors. He has Product and Marketing management experience in Bay area startups in mobile and rich internet applications as well as large high tech corporations.

Norberto is also a member of the Product Design Committee at Clever Sense.

Norberto is Clever Sense’s resident globetrotter. He speaks 6 languages, and has lived in Germany, Finland, Sweden and Portugal. He holds a MS in Engineering and a Berkeley MBA, with a focus on technology and entrepreneurship.
